name: Highways and Y-ways
description:
This is my first game - and it is still very much a work in progress. Since I work full time in an unrelated field, I will continue to work on this little guy when time permits.

Highways and Y-ways is a simple Paperboy-inspired game. Dodge the rocket cars coming at you and hit the targets to keep things from spinning out of control. Let me know what you think!
